consent_data.msg: The tips you will receive in this programme have been developed by UNICEF, UNHCR, and the Global Initiative to Support Parents.

consent_data.metadata.description:
{STOP} placeholder: do not edit
{consent_link} placeholder: do not edit

consent_data.msg: Press YES if you agree with this. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
consent_data.metadata.description:
YES needs to be consistent with "yes_option"
EXIT needs to be consistent with "exit_option"

consent_data.msg: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
consent_data.metadata.description:
BACK needs to be consistent with "back_option"
NO needs to be consistent with "stop_option"

consent_data.msg:
If you ever return to participate in the programme, type HELLO. 

We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
That is wonderful, thank you so much!
Can you please confirm that you are 18 years old or older?

consent_data.metadata.description: what is accepted if they want to select "above_age_opt"
what is accepted if they want to select "below_age_opt"

consent_data.msg: Sorry, ParentText is only for people over the age of 18. Do you confirm that you are under the age of 18?

If you want to experience ParentText, you can always share it with your parents or caregivers who are over the age of 18.
{insert link}

onboarding_messages.msg: Welcome to ParentText. Every parent everywhere needs support. We hope we can help.
onboarding_messages.metadata.description: first message after language selection (if present)

onboarding_messages.msg: Here is a video that shows how to use ParentText.

onboarding_question_language_data.question:
Please select your language:

Choisissez votre ethnie:

onboarding_question_with_opt_data.question: ParentText is easiest to use when you receive content as videos, images and text. However, your data bundle and bandwidth may not support videos. To save on data, you can opt to receive the same content with a smaller audio file or as text. How would you like to receive ParentText?
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
